name: Space Legend (wolfdeveloper)
description:
I have created an Space Shooter type of Game.

It's pretty basic we started it as a Challenge with a friend in order to finish our first somewhat polished Game.

Here is my result. I would love for some feedback.

Controls : 

Movement W, A, S, D

Sprinting LShift

Shooting Space

For now the Game only works with Full HD settings (1920x1080)

If the UI looks weird it's cause of that I will be fixing it in the next build! probably.
